messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

leaver inventory update tuesday pm leaver form intern hello please informed intern she has received job offer her accounts canceled thank specialist

message.reasoning:

Initial analysis suggests potential relevance to "HR Support" due to the mention of a "leaver form," but other categories are also possible. I'm carefully considering how to best map the words to the defined schema.
